artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: old woman with a hooded cloak seated in a chir at right, accompanied by a standing woman wearing a similar cloak; seated man at left; large bookcase behind figures; text at top and bottom: "GALERIA DEL TEATRO INFANTIL / EL CONSULTORIO MEDICO. / PROPIETARIO / A. VANEGAS ARROYO MEXICO"
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Consultorio Médico (The Consultation), plate 10 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
